thread.title: Engineers say recyclable car parts are within reach

title: Engineers say recyclable car parts are within reach
text:
Engineers say recyclable car parts are within reach 4:53pm BST - 01:59
A team of engineers searching for sustainable alternatives to carbon fibre say recyclable car parts made with natural fibres are a realistic possibility. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A team of engineers searching for sustainable alternatives to carbon fibre say recyclable car parts made with natural fibres are a realistic possibility. Stuart McDill reports.
